articles.title: While OpenAI races to build AI data centers, Nadella reminds us that Microsoft already has them
articles.description: Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella offered a glimpse of the "first of many" massive Nvidia AI systems it is rolling out, starting now.
articles.author: Julie Bort

articles.title: Andreessen Horowitz denies report of India office, calls it ‘fake news’
articles.description: a16z’s Anish Acharya calls India office reports “entirely fake news!”
articles.author: Jagmeet Singh

articles.title: Reflection AI raises $2B to be America’s open frontier AI lab, challenging DeepSeek
articles.description: Reflection, once focused on autonomous coding agents, has raised $2B at an $8B valuation to expand into both an opensource alternative to closed
articles.author: Rebecca Bellan

articles.title: Discord data breach affects at least 70,000 users
articles.description: The platform said in a press release that hackers breached a third-party vendor that Discord uses for age-related appeals.
articles.author: Amanda Silberling

articles.title: Sora copycats flooded Apple’s App Store, and some still remain
articles.description: Imposter Sora apps saw hundreds of thousands of downloads before Apple pulled them from the App Store.
articles.author: Sarah Perez

articles.title: Stoke Space’s $510M round shows the future of launch belongs to defense
articles.description: Stoke's new raise highlights how the launch industry is being shaped by major U.S. defense initiatives.
articles.author: Aria Alamalhodaei

articles.title: Intel unveils new processor powered by its 18A semiconductor tech
articles.description: Intel announces new processors produced in Arizona as the company looks to increase its U.S. manufacturing.
articles.author: Rebecca Szkutak

articles.title: Italian businessman’s phone reportedly targeted with Paragon spyware
articles.description: The alleged targeting of prominent Italian businessman Francesco Gaetano Caltagirone now widens the Paragon spyware scandal in Italy to victims
articles.author: Lorenzo Franceschi-Bicchierai

articles.title: ‘Dozens’ of organizations had data stolen in Oracle-linked hacks
articles.description: The mass-hacks targeting Oracle E-Business customers is the latest hacking campaign by Clop, an extortion group known for abusing security flaws in
articles.author: Zack Whittaker

articles.title: YouTubers who were kicked off the platform for rule violations can now request a ‘second chance’
articles.description: Creators who repeatedly violated YouTube's past COVID-19 and election integrity policies will be eligible to request new accounts.
articles.author: Amanda Silberling

articles.title: Netflix is letting users play games on their TV screens
articles.description: Alongside the announcement, Netflix revealed the new slate of games it’s launching, all of which are party titles meant to be played in groups.
articles.author: Lauren Forristal

articles.title: Figma partners with Google to add Gemini AI to its design platform
articles.description: Figma is adding Gemini to its AI toolset.
articles.author: Sarah Perez

articles.title: Datacurve raises $15 million to take on Scale AI
articles.description: Datacurve uses a “bounty hunter” system to attract skilled software engineers to complete the hardest-to-source datasets.
articles.author: Russell Brandom

articles.title: Startup Battlefield company SpotitEarly trained dogs and AI to sniff out common cancers
articles.description: The company's at home multi-cancer breath test kit is expected to be available to consumers in 2026.
articles.author: Marina Temkin

articles.title: Meta adds Hindi and Portuguese support for its AI translation feature for Reels
articles.description: Meta is expanding its AI-powered translation features for Reels with support for Hindi and Portuguese to target markets like India and Brazil.
articles.author: Ivan Mehta

articles.title: Sora hit 1M downloads faster than ChatGPT
articles.description: This level of consumer adoption is worth noting because Sora remains an invite-only app, while ChatGPT was more publicly available at launch. That
articles.author: Sarah Perez

articles.title: Duolingo says it will ‘never’ open a San Francisco office
articles.description: "For us, Pittsburgh isn’t a 'backup plan' to the Bay Area," the language learning app said.

articles.title: Navigating the next frontier at TechCrunch Disrupt 2025: Where investors see opportunity in space

articles.title: Novoloop’s upcycled plastic takes a step closer to production
articles.description: Novoloop has signed a deal with a contract manufacturer to produce its Lifecycled TPU material.
articles.author: Tim De Chant
